name: EXPERIMENTAL FILM 3: "CYCLOPS / POLYPHEMUS"
description:
[SOUND ON]

The THIRD "work-in-progress" video sketch for an 
upcoming large scale collaboration with
David Feltner -- the creator of 100 Goobers
on OPEN SEAS.
https://opensea.io/collection/100-goobers
Follow DAVID 
@feltnerlii on TWITTER.

Grab this early piece before our large-scale collab is done.

Music and Art "Face of Rage" by HPLoveBux
New Digital Video effects by David Feltner and HPL

notes - this scene represents the fear of monster POLYPHEMUS THE CYCLOPS, felt by the sailors as they attempt to escape by hiding underneath sheep ... notice how the image makes a single eye at least three times! there is a message hidden there ...
